thoughts: Slashes {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws into the ground clumsily
Stares into space, almost as if trying to remember something
Tries to groom the blood dripping from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} fur, almost out of habit
Tries to put some prey on the fresh-kill pile, but it's thrown out due to being obviously infected
Really needs to take a bath!
Tumbles around camp, seemingly unbothered by how hard {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/hit/hits} the ground
Squints at other Clan cats, almost like {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} trying to recognize their faces
Tries to snarl out 'm_c' when r_c asks if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/know/knows} {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} name
Trying to bite r_c, but {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} too agile
Hissing at everything that moves, especially r_c
Intensely stares at r_c as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} perform {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} duties
